mapper.select: select distinct a.menu_id, a.menu_name, a.menu_url, a.root_link, a.menu_pid , a.menu_order, a.avatar, a.menu_desc from sc_menu a, role_menu_rela b where a.MENU_ID = b.MENU_ID and b.ROLE_ID in #{item} order by menu_order

select menu_id "id", menu_pid "pid", menu_name "text", menu_desc "desc", menu_order "order", menu_url "url", CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sc_menu b WHERE b.menu_pid = a.menu_id) THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END "children", 'fa fa-file-o' as "icon" from sc_menu a where 1 = 1 and menu_pid = #{pid} order by menu_order, menu_id
SELECT role_id FROM sc_role where ROLE_NAME in #{item}
